name: Arigo
overview:
Arigo develops Global Sourcing & Trade Management software solutions that enable private label retailers, brand owners, and wholesalers to accelerate, automate, and optimize their global supply chain. The company offers Arigo STM Suite, Global Sourcing & Trade Management software that provides visibility into supply chain and logistics operations and enables retailers to collaborate with all parties involved in global transactions. The software is configured with time-tested, best practices driven from deep industry expertise. Providing complete visibility across the supply chain, retailers can track and analyze data direct from the factory floor. Advanced Modules allow retailers to store, protect, collaborate, and manage diverse product information; including pre-production, sourcing, vendor performance, quality-assurance, transport optimization and post-production lifecycle information. Its solutions help customers to develop and source products, assess and track factories/suppliers, and manage cost through complex supply chain processes. The company also provides business services, such as consultation, implementation and training, account support and maintenance, business improvement analysis, application configuration and optimization, process and systems integrations, and a suite of intelligence tools for reporting and analytics. Arigo offers its products as software-as-a-service model or on-premise installation.

The company was formerly known as RockBlocks Group, Inc. and changed its name to Arigo in September 2008. Arigo was founded in 2007 and is based in North Billerica, Massachusetts. It has operations in the United States and China.

milestones.description: Supply & Demand Chain Executive Names RockBlocks Group among the Top 100
